tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    date_submitted DATE
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id   INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id   INT,
    product_id    INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating        INT
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id   INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name    VARCHAR(50),
    last_name     VARCHAR(50),
    email         VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number  VARCHAR(20)
);
CREATE TABLE feedback (feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, product_id INT, feedback_text TEXT, rating INT);
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name TEXT, email TEXT, phone_number TEXT);
CREATE TABLE products (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name TEXT, description TEXT, price DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE product_rating(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  rating FLOAT,
  feedback_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (feedback_id) REFERENCES customer_feedback(id)
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_strategies(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
  target_audience VARCHAR(255),
  campaign_start_date DATE,
  campaign_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_feedback(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  feedback_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES marketing_strategies(id)
);
